entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kemptville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:58 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 04:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: S 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
